sect1.title: Project description
sect1.para: Portal connector provide web service to retrieve data for Portal. Portal connector works with ivy engine from 6.0 SÃ¤ntis. E.g. 6.2.
In this release, IsAlive web service is deprecated and replaced by ApplicationService.

sect1.title: Features
sect1.para: All Portal connector web services are secured now with authentication.

Portal connector provide service to get data about:
Absence
Application
Case
Process start
Security
Supported language
Task
User setting
Web start (Process start and case map)

listitem.para: Introduced the LibraryService WS to get the project version
Param: JsonQuery is added to CaseService for CaseQuery customization
Param: JsonQuery is added to TaskService for TaskQuery customization
URL detection on single server: use request URL to generate links for processes, tasks
